column4: What was the command to monitor the data a device is processing? I tried cat /dev/ttyS1 to 7 but got an error "cat: /dev/ttyS1: Input/output error"
it should already reconize it but what installer you using?
the mouse won't work in that install version cd anyways
I can select the install option, but i lose keyboard after that
sorry, i meant i lose my keyboard
not really since it seems to be part of the installer problem but you sure you lose it you can't press the up or down arrows and it won't move?
it won't move and i also can't change the lights, such as caps and num lock
you know of any boot param for the install that will recheck PS2 components?
there are errors that show up but the are too quick for me to copy
